EXTRAORDINARY

The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
(Published by Authority)
PART I : SECTION (I) — GENERAL
Government Notifications
1a- PG 5891 - 506 (07/2022) 
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk
THE  POST  OFFICE  ORDINANCE
RULE made by the Minister of Mass Media with the concurrence of the General Treasury under the Post Office Ordinance 
(Chapter 190).
 
 Bandula Gunawardana,
 Minister of Mass Media.
Colombo,
08
thjune 2022.
Rules
the Postal Rules 1934 published in the supplement of  No. 8,093 of 30th November, 1934 as amended by any 
subsequent rule and again amended by Extraordinary Gazette No. 2051/31 of 28.12.2017 are hereby further amended with 
effect from 01st august 2022 as follows:

2a
FOREIGN  POSTAGE  RATES  WITH  EFFECT  FROM  01STAugust— 2022
all rates are mentioned in sri lankan Rupees (lKR)
(A)	FOREIGN AIRMAIL RATES
Rates
 A B C D E F G H
1  Letters  -First 20g 110 120 130 140 150 160 170 210
 every additional 10g (Max – 2 kg) 35 40 40 45 50 55 60 85
2 Printed matter - First 20g 105 115 120 130 140 150 160 205
 every additional 10g (Max – 2 kg) 35 40 40 45 50 55 60 85
3 Post Cards 70
4 Aerogrammes 70
5 Small Packets service available only in sea Mail
6 U Packets – New Service- First 50g 240 260 280 300 330 350 380 480
every additional  50g (Max 2kg) 170 195 215 240 260 285 310 420

(D) SPECIAL SERVICES FOR FOREIGN AIR/SEA MAIL
  Services Rates
1 Inquiry Fee (For Registered articles, Parcels, eMs)  
 (a). Ordinary Inquiry Free
 (b). Inquiry requesting for a written proof or POd 100
2 Registration Fee 870
3 Insured Fee 1050
4 Advice of Delivery  for  Registered article (at the same time of posting) 460
5 Withdrawal from the post and Alteration or Correction of Address 
(via CN17 after the posting) 610
6 Minimum surcharge on Underpaid articles ( addition to the postage) 160
7 International Reply coupons - Selling Price stocks Not available for 
sale
8 International Reply coupons (Encashment in stamps)  210
(Max)
9 delivery Handling Charges  -  Packet  150
10 delivery Handling Charges  -  Parcel   250
11 Fumigation Fees as decided by Customs
12 Warehousing Charges - Per day 60
13 late fees for Posting Per Item 30

• Maximum weight limits of EMS, Air Parcel, SAL Parcel and Sea Parcels are Subject to destination countries.
• Subsequent to this gazette notification, a Post Office Circular will be issued to the implementation of the New Services.
